sentences.en: A Comparison of the Probation Legislation between Macao and the Mainland.
sentences.cn: 澳门与大陆缓刑立法之比较.

sentences.en: After two people arrive at Macao, Tan Yi along, but.
sentences.cn: 二人抵澳门后, 谭亦尾随而至.

sentences.en: Do you have any opinion on the return of Macao?
sentences.cn: 你对澳门的回归有什么看法?

sentences.en: Give advices for improving the Macao's official external trade statistic system. "
sentences.cn: 提供建议,藉以完善澳门外贸统计系统.

sentences.en: I'm going to make sure if I'm going to Macao.
sentences.cn: 我要拿定主意我是否去澳门.

sentences.en: Like all gold rushes, Macao has attracted a raucous and colourful community.
sentences.cn: 就像所有的淘金热一样, 澳门吸引了五花八门的各色群体.

sentences.en: Macao altogether has 28 banks, including 3 disembark banks.
sentences.cn: 澳门共有28家银行, 包括3家离岸银行.

sentences.en: Macao finance administrative bureau yesterday urgent convention press conference.
sentences.cn: 澳门金融管理局昨天紧急召开新闻发布会.

sentences.en: Macao's return will end years of humiliating foreign rule over Chinese land.
sentences.cn: 澳门的回归将从此借宿外国中国土地上统治耻辱的年代.

sentences.en: Miss Pao was born and raised in Macao and was said to have Portuguese blood.
sentences.cn: 鲍小姐生长澳门,据说身体里有葡萄牙人的血.

sentences.en: Other popular destinations are Yunnan, Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.
sentences.cn: 此外, 云南以及港澳台也是很受欢迎的出游地.

sentences.en: Please find out when the ship sails for Macao.
sentences.cn: 帮我查一下那艘船什么时候开往澳门.

sentences.en: The Macao's return must greatly satisfy all ranks and races in China.
sentences.cn: 澳门回归对于中国各阶层人士和各民族人民来说,必定是一件大快人心的事情.

sentences.en: These are ferries that ply between Hong Kong and Macao.
sentences.cn: 这些是往返香港和澳门间的渡轮.

sentences.en: This service is applicable for Macao mobile phone number only.
sentences.cn: 本项服务只适用于澳门流动电话号码.

trans.tran_cn: 澳门（在广东珠江口西侧）
